alert.note: Alert for Knox; Sullivan (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 04 at 9:54PM EST until January 09 at 11:00PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River at Seymour. Wabash River at Lafayette and at Montezuma. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Illinois... East Fork White River near Rivervale. White River at Elliston...and at Edwardsport down to Hazleton. Wabash River at Covington...and at Terre Haute down to Riverton... and at Mount Carmel. .Upwards of two inches of rainfall this past weekend put several rivers across central Indiana into flood. The Wabash is expected to crest near Hutsonville Wednesday...and the crest on the White River will approach Petersburg through Thursday. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at Riverton. * WHEN...Until late Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Extensive lowland flooding is in progress. High water surrounds many river cabins. Access to most river cabins is by boat only. Levees begin to protect farmland. Extensive flooding of Leaverton Park occurs in Palestine, Illinois. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CST Tuesday /9:00 PM EST Tuesday/ the stage was 17.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 PM CST Tuesday /9:00 PM EST Tuesday/ was 17.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late Sunday morning and continue falling to 11.4 feet Friday, January 14. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued by noon Wednesday.
